name: (College Game) Ovis
description:
Ovis is a platformer game about a girl who must herd a flock of sheep through a dangerous mountain as part of her villages centuries old tradition.

NOTE: This was a game developed for a college project which only required one level and so that is what I made, usually I'd go overkill with something like this but there are other projects that I am working on too along with my contribution to Uprise Games.
